Her mother had been making huge meals every since she gained weight. Runo didn't want her mom to feel so she usually ate everything that her mom made for her. She put her hand on her flat stomach and thought "im glad i haven't gained any weight."

said sincerely. She then looked closer at who she bumped into and recognized that it was.....

1112.content: Once runo finished shopping she brought the supplies home to her parents. Her mom told her that she would tell her when dinner was ready. So runo sat and watched tv for a while. Then her mom called her for dinner. When Runo went into the dining room she found so much food. Her mom ussually made so much food but his made all other meals look like snacks. "well don't just stand there dig in runo"said runo's mom. Runo didn't want to eat much but she didn't want her mom to feel bad. "Don't worry runo you'll love" said runo's mom. "ok mom" said runo. So she took a bite and..
1112.title: she finishes shopping and goes home to find tha...

choices: Mrs. Misaki starts cooking huge meals for Runo.
Runo asks her mom to fatten her up.
11121.content:
Runo was astounded by the taste of the food and started eating as much as she could. Her mom was happy, but grew concerned when Runo sped up her eating.

"Careful, Runo! You'll get a bellyache if you keep eating that fast!" Runo was too preoccupied with the food to pay too much attention to anything else.

A half hour later:

Runo laid back and rubbed her stuffed belly. She had eaten so much, her belt popped off. She must have eaten at least three pounds of food.

"Mom, that was great! You've got to cook like this more often." Runo was thoroughly impressed with her mother and hoped to eat like this more often. Mrs. Misaki felt a mixture of pride and concern. She was glad her daughter loved her cooking, but wondered if Runo was going to get fat if she kept eating like this. She put off this dilemma for now.

"Maybe you should lie down for a bit, Runo. You look a little sick." Runo slowly walked to her room, all the while showing a satisfied grin on her face, still rubbing her belly. Mrs. Misaki then concluded that Runo didn't seem to mind if she got fatter. Runo thought the same thing; if her mother's cooking was that good, it was worth getting fat for it, especially since she felt she was too thin, anyway.
11121.title: Stunning Taste

choices: Skip ahead a month to see how much Runo has grown.
111212.content:
Though Runo wasn't hoping to gain weight at first, she noticed that although she was thin, she felt that it didn't suit her. It didn't seem right to her that she was thin. She felt like she needed to get bigger. Runo also believed she was missing out on all kinds of food by keeping thin. If she was fat, she wouldn't have to worry and could eat whatever she wanted.

The next morning:

Runo saw that her mom had made a big breakfast that her dad had started eating into. She wondered what her parents would think when she told them she wanted to be fat.

"Mom, Dad," she said, "Do you think I'm too... thin?" Mr. and Mrs. Misaki didn't respond right away. They still wondered why their daughter was worried about being thin. "I think I need to fatten up." Mrs. Misaki then said, "Well, Runo, why do you think you should be bigger?"

"I just want to, I guess." Mr. Misaki still looked a bit strange, but spoke up. "It just doesn't seem like you to think about being too thin, honey." "I know, Dad," Runo said. "I was thinking, though, and I was hoping I could fatten up with these big meals." Runo then dug in and ate a couple of pancakes.

Mrs. Misaki looked at her husband, who shrugged. She turned to Runo and said, "All right Runo, we'll help you, but you've got to help us make the meals. We can't do everything, you know." Runo looked up and said, "No problem! I'll do whatever you need me to do!"
111212.title: Hip to Be Round

choices: The other girls were still thin.
1112122.content:
After a month of preparing and eating large meals, Runo had doubled in size. Her signature shirt rode up to around her chest, while her skirt had to be refitted to keep from popping off. She was happy to eat so much, though, and loved cooking those meals.

"Oooh, that was good!" Runo just finished an apple pie and patted her belly. It was a large part of her new 170 pound body. It also sometimes got her stuck in her seat, but Runo had gotten used to prying herself out. She waddled upstairs after clearing her place and looked at her growth. Not only had her belly grown, her face resembled a stuffed chipmunk. Her arms and legs grew to sausage-like proportions and had torn her gloves and socks when she tried putting them on. She no longer wore her belt, either; it just wouldn't fit around her. Runo was happy, however; she finally felt right with herself.

She waddled back downstairs after hearing the doorbell and found that it was Julie, Alice and Chan Lee, having dropped by for a visit, but they were shocked to see how much Runo had grown. Runo was surprised to see them, too.
1112122.title: Big Brawler

choices: they come over to runo's house for dinner and eat her mom's delicious cooking
they decline but decide to hang out tomorrow
11121221.content: Runo was surprised to see her friends after so long. Her friends were surprised to see her too. They were more surprised at her size. "Hey guys" said runo. None of them wanted to seem impolite so they didn't mention anything about her weight gain. "hey runo how are you" said julie."i'm doing fine" said runo. She could tell her friends didn't want to seem rude so she didn't mention her weight gain to them. "Hey maybe you guys should come over for dinner" runo said.
11121221.title: The other girls were still thin.

choices: the next day runo wants to hang out with the girls at a buffet.
The other girls decide to gain too
111212211.content:
"Sure" said julie not knowing that it was runo's mom's cooking that made her gain the weight. "Yea it will be fun" said alice. "we can catch up" said runo.
So that night they all came over and saw all the food that Runo and her Mom prepared. Their was so much the other girls could barely believe how much food there was. "well don't just stand there guys sit down and dig in" said runo. As soon as they sat down they saw runo diving at the food, barely stopping to chew. The girls didn't want Runo to feel bad so they started eating and couldn't stop eventually all the food had gone. Although Runo ate the most the other girls stomachs were distended.
111212211.title: they come over to runo's house for dinner a...

choices: Julie and Alice take a break for a while and start stuffing down cookies
1112122111.content: "Ugh, I feel so full" said Julie, rubbing her stomach that was slightly bulged out over her belt. "Yes it certainly was a big dinner" Alice said with a smile with her hand on her stomach. The three girls had a great feast. Runo certainly felt full and was used to the effects of it thanks to her bulging stomach that hung over her skirt. Just then Runo said "Hey you guys, you know a perfect place to catch up on old times" the girls listened while still recovering from the effects from the enormous feast "The cafe". To Julie and Alice that word meant pain in the stomach at the moment. Julie rubbed her stomach to ease the psyhological pain she felt. Alice however, didn't really get set off in pain as much as Julie did. Runo then continued "So its settled then, we go to the cafe tomorow". Julie and Alice had to agree. They didn't see their friend in a long time. It seemed like the right thing to do. "Yeah...fine Runo" Julie said as best as she could while slouching over on her chair. Her belly was pushing against her belt. She wanted so badly to loosen it up but she couldn't as she didn't want to be rude, so her belly tightened against her waistband with great force as she kept it on. She felt like the belt was going to pop off. "So you guys ready for desert" asked Runo. Julie could barely move and that word sent an even bigger strike of mentally fueled pain to her midsection. Alice also felt a bit rattled as she didn't really want to eat anymore. At that moment, as if on que, Runo's mom walked in with a gigantic plate of Giant sized chocolate chip cookies and a jug of milk. Julie couldn't bear it anymore and said calmly as she could "No thanks Runo I'm really full, but thanks for the offer" Julie said this kindly. Runo's mom however said "Oh you don't want any cookies dear?" "Julie kindly responded "No thank you". Runo's mom however replied "Well I'm sorry to hear that dear". "Why " Julie asked. "Well in this house we make sure that every peice of food on the table is chewed and stuffed into our stomachs, even if it means that we have to force it down. I make sure that I make 2x as much food for guests so that they can eat and eat until its all stuffed down your throat, so sorry dear but we can't let you go home tonight until you finish every single last cookie here, have a good night's sleep and then eat a big breakfast in the morning". Julie sat dumbfounded and shocked by what she had just heard. She couldn't eat anymore, let alone move. "No way, please, I'm full" she said. "Well I suppose you can take a break, but its feeding time for you two later" said Runo's mom as she left for them to finish the desert. "Well you heard my mom" Runo said. "Get ready to eat".
1112122111.title: Cafe plans.

choices: Julie agrees to eat, if she loses a brawl
11121221112.content:
The next morning, Julie and Alice were groggy and moaning in pain, Julie much moreso than Alice. Both were too stuffed after dinner to even attempt to leave, and still their stomachs bulged.

"Ohh, my stomach!" Julie cried as she rubbed her fattened stomach, "It feels like I gained 20 lbs!"

"Yeah, me too..." Alice agreed, but she didn't sound too sad. Just then Runo appeared. She was wearing an apron over her stretched, body hugging yellow pajamas. There were food stains on the shirt, especially on the chest area, which had grown as much as Runo's stomach. Julie couldn't help but feel a twinge of jealousy.

"Good morning guys, I hope your ready for breakfast." The blue haired girl said, Tigrera on her shoulder.

"Aw, already?" Julie whined, Gorem was out with her, "I'm still full."

"Julie, Runo spent the last three hours making this food just for you two, you really should try it." Tigrera said.

"Yeah Julie, I'm kinda hungry too." Alice agreed. Julie noticed that her lower body seemed a bit chunkier, as well as her belly.

"See, Alice is on board!" Runo said, still happy, "Now c'mon Julie."

Suddenly...
11121221112.title: A belly busting breakfast

choices: Try to escape from the  window
111212211121.content:
Julie cried out "I have to go to the bathroom" and ran off to it. Runo and Alice were surprised at Julie's sudden outburst. "Maybe we should leave Julie alone" said Alice. Runo however thought otherwise and said "No, lets wait for her. I don't want anybody that visits this house thats my friend to miss breakfast. I want to see her fill her stomach with the food that I made". Runo said this in a very sneaky tone, as though she was planning something(which she was). Alice then asked Runo "Why do you and your mom want us to eat so badly"? "Because in this house when a skinny guest like you and Julie come over we make sure that you both get filled up and get as much nourishment as you can by stuffing your faces with loads and loads of food. We want to see it go down your throats with great gutso until your stomachs are filled to the max and all the plates are empty. That is our policy". Alice responded to Runo's answer with a shocked face. She had never heard Runo talk like that before. Of coure, she had also never seen her like the way she is now, her rounded out cherubic face that made her cheeks look like they had swollen over both sides of her mouth. Her chubby arms and plump fingers along with her belly that stuck out over her waistband and jiggled slightly when she moved, and her thick sausage legs that always seem to stick together.

While Runo and Alice waited for Julie, Julie was in the bathroom examing herself. She looked down and saw her slightly chubby potbelly that bulged out a little bit over her skirt. She poked it gently and her finger seemed to have sunk in a bit. When she took her finger out the flab returned to its normal position and looked like she never even touched it. "Oh no. It must've beem those cookies yesterday, now I have this potbelly". The newly curved belly wasn't her only new feature. She then put both hands on her thighs and squeezed them, showing how much fat had accumulated on her and filling her out. She could tell that they were fatter because of how they spread when she clenched her fingers into them. I've got to get out of here before I get any fatter. She saw the bathroom window, but she wanted to take the direct aprroach and go past Runo and her mom through the front door. What does he do
111212211121.title: Julie agrees to eat, if she loses a brawl

1112122111211.content:
Julie decided that her best option would be to confront Runo and her mom directly, that way they would understand how she felt, and maybe respect her decision.

Walking out of the bathroom,Julie found Runo and her Mom chatting, whilst Alice began to pig out on the food.

"Runo, Ms. Misaki, I don't want any more food, and I refuse to eat anymore today!" Julie said firmly, placing her hands on her somewhat chunkier hips.

At first, the two Misaki women looked at her in surprise. "Why not? I made it especially for you guys!" Runo said.

"Because I'm getting fat, and I don't want to be any bigger!" Julie replied, "If it's a problem, I'm sorry, but that's just how I feel..."

Runo was saddened, so much so that she looked like she might cry, that's when Runo's mom had had enough.

"That's it Julie! I don't care how you feel about your figure, no one comes in here and makes my precious child cry, friend or no friend! I challenge you to a Bakugan brawl, and if I win you have to stay and eat as long as we want you to!"

"Wha? You have a Bakugan?" Julie cried in surprise...Runo looked shocked too.

"Of course," Mrs. Misaki said, before producing a Haos, pig like Bakugan. "Meet Haos Porcina!"

"Hello, nice to meet you, puhi!" The bakugan replied. Julie was intrigued and suprised...Runo's mom was probably an amateur that Gorem could squash in two minutes flat.

"Well in that case, let's brawl!" Julie exclaimed.
1112122111211.title: A Brawl with Runo's mom?!

choices: She lets Julie choose when to eat
She sits Julie down, puts a fork in her hand and a plate, and tells her to eat
11121221112111.content:
The two opened the Bakufield using their field cards. A harsh light flowed from the two cards and bith Julie and Runos mom were transported to a void in Bakuspace. Runo's mom made the first move and set the gate-card, to Julie's surprise. She didn't think that she could move that fast. But Julie soon followed throwing her gate-card as well.

The brawl began as Julie threw Gorem into the field. "Alright Gorem, lets win this" shouted Julie. Suddenly she was distracted by a sudden tightness located on her waist area. She looked down to see that her new chunky belly was tightening against her shorts. "Ugh, I hate this thing. I wish this flab would just go away" thought Julie as she tried to press her belly into herself, only to find that it wouldn't move an inch. Each time she pressed into it her hands just squished into it as it spread its jelly like flab across Julie's waistband. "Hey its time to Brawl you unaprecciative little brat" said Runo's mom. Julie simply removed her hands from her flab, watching for a brief moment as it just hung about 1/4 of an inch over her waistband and focused on the brawl. Runo's mom was holding Haos Porcina. "Its my turn kid" she said as she threw Porcina onto the field. The Bakugan looked like a pig with a smiley face and the body of a warrior with a curly tail. "I bet shes not even good" Julie said in a show of underestimating her opponent. Julie then looked up to Porcina's eyes that locked onto hers. Julie then heard her stomach growl. "Woah, w-why do I feel a bit hungry" she asked as she held her flabby stomach. "That's right kid, look into Porcina's eyes, you'll have food stuffed down your throat in no time" Runo's mom thought to herself as she observed Julie falling for Porcina's hypnotic suggestion. "Julie, Julie" a voice called to Julie who then looked up. It was Gorem calling out to her to wake up. "Aren't we going to Brawl". "Yeah, don't worry" said Julie. "I activate my ability car-" suddenly Julie was cut off by Runo's mom. "I activate Porcina's ability. It can make an opponent's monster attack and prevent its owner from using ability cards to help it. Also, no gate cards. Julie couldn't believe it she had lost before the first turn was done. As she stood there shocked, Gorem was being hypnotically drawn into attacking. He had 550 gs while Porcina had 600gs and Porcina defeated him. "No...I can't lose" mumbled Julie as she stood completely dazed as Gorem transformed back into a ball.

"Well, looks like I win." The field dissapeared and Julie and Runo's mom returned to the room they were in before. Runo looked in surprise. "Mom, what happened" asked the chubby blue haired girl. "Oh I just taught Julie a lesson in appreciation, right Julie"? Julie merely lowered her head in defeat. Alice was sitting and eating when she turned to see Julie return, but seeing as her mind was fixed on the food she shrugged and once again picked up her fork and continued eating big bites. "I can't believe I lost" said Julie. "Now come on Julie, let me show you what we have to eat" said Runo' mom as she led Julie to the kitchen.
11121221112111.title: An unexpected victory

choices: That Julie's parents were letting her stay for the next week (skip ahead)
She had ordered 50 pizzas to celebrate for an upcoming Bakugan tournament
111212211121112.content:
A moment later, Runo's mom set a plate, fork, and knife before Julie and went off to get the rest of the food that Runo had prepared.

As Julie sat there sadly, looking at her new flab sadly, she couldn't help but question how she and Gorem had lost to Porcina and Mrs. Misaki. Porcina didn't seem to be any regular Bakugan, something about her was strange...Especially her stare.

While the gray haired girl was thinking about her defeat, she saw Runo's mom come in with ten plates, one piled high with thick, greasy bacon, another with warm pancakes, slathered with fresh butter and syrup, accompanied by gargantuan plates of eggs, sausages, french toast, rolls, some grapes, bananas, grits, and apple slices.

"All that's left after Runo and Alice ate?!" Julie questioned incredulously.

"No, I told Runo that you wanted some extra food by way of saying thanks, so right now she's making more...Alice fell asleep after we explained, such kindness on her part letting you have this wonderful meal. Now eat up Julie!"

At first, Julie was going to futily resist eating the staggering amount of victuals, but when she saw it all in front of her, something in her mind clicked.

Before she knew it, she was tearing into the food more and more, forgoing the utensils and stuffing food in her mouth, chewing fast and sparingly, uttering an occasional, involuntary grunt.

Runo's mom would've admonished her for lack of manners, but she was taken by the girl's enthusiasm.

"Well I'm glad to see you enjoying your meal Julie, just keep eating until your full." Mrs. Misaki said, smiling at both her and Porcina.

Four hours later, Julie was in severe pain, lying on her back and moaning while rubbing her engorged tummy, while Runo and Alice watched in concern. What had come over her? All she had done was eat and eat, with no ability to refuse. Something was wrong with her?

As time passed Ms. Misaki came in on the phone and told the girls...
111212211121112.title: After-effects

choices: They go shopping and have a mock fashion show.
11121222.content:
Note: SEGA and I believe Spin Toys owns Bakugan.

Despite the initial shock of seeing each other so fat, the girls had a good laugh and went up to Runo's room to compare sizes.

While all of them grew everywhere, the proportions were just slightly different. Runo was an all-over growth, without a particularly oversized area. Again, she weighed 170 lbs. Julie was only 165 lbs., the lightest of the group, but still quite fat. Her chest was just a bit bigger, making the buttons on her purple shirt pop. The belt on her shorts had long been discarded, while its button had popped, too. Chan Lee grew to 180 lbs. and it showed a bit more on her rear. The lower part of her red dress could still cover it; this was a good thing, since she no longer wore her pants. The upper part was strained and had torn in the middle, letting her belly flow. Alice, surprisingly, was the biggest, growing to 200 lbs. Her outfit was totally different from before, now a pink t-shirt and a pink skirt reaching just above her knees. Her hair was tied in a ponytail. Her belly was the biggest part, too big to contain in her old shirt or in a dress.

The girls were then wondering what to do next after comparing each other's sizes.
11121222.title: Big Brawlers

134.content: Alice and her Darkus Hydranoid were out running errands one day. they were low on groceries and her grandfather needed some things for his lab. they were walking along when Alice spotted a peculiar bakugan in a storefront window. It had all the expected qualities of a bakugan, the coloring of its ball form suggesting that it was a Darkus/Pyrus Hybrid. Although Alice was suprised to see this bakugan, her Hydranoid sensed that there was something else that was he found suspicious. Alice said "That's an interesting bakugan. I've never seen one with this kind of coloring before. What do you think Hydranoid?" Seeing this as his chance, Hydranoid piped up "I don't know, Alice. Something about this bakugan seems a bit fishy to me. But it would be nice for me to have some company. Why don't you go in and ask how much it is?" Alice went inside the store and asked the clerk how much the bakugan she saw in the window was. "The bakugan in the window? you can go ahead and take it if you like. it's free!"
134.title: Strange new Bakugan

1342.content:
Alice was willing to take the Bakugan, but..........

"Do you know what the Bakugan is named?" She asked the store clerk. His response wasn't immendent. "Actually, I don't know what it's called. Are you-"

Alice picked up the Bakugan. "Yep, I am. Thank you!"

"You're welcome." was the store clerks response.

As Alice left the store, she wondered what to do next........
1342.title: Who's that Bakugan?

135.title: Other

14.content:
It was another peaceful but boring day in New Vestroia for Mira Clay.

It had been a month since the fall of King Hydrom, and all was well.

The Bakugan and Vestals were living in peace, Spectra (Aka Keith, her big brother) was home, and she had nothing to do.

With no more goals or drive, Mira just sat around the house, eating and drinking while watching tv or playing video games. Even Vulcan, her close Bakugan friend couldn't get her to change her routine, and she had already put on 15 lbs.

The one interesting thing in the blue eyed girl's life was that they'd be visiting Dan and the others next week.

"Still...that's so far away." Mira said to herself while eating chips, but she soon rose and yawned. "I might as well do something today, maybe I'll...."
14.title: Mira's beginning

choices: go out to a restaurant for diner

"Wow...It's been a while Mira." he said."It sure had"replyed Mira. Ace greeted Mira in his house and talked for a little while and then Ace asked Mira if she would like to...
